pageTitle: KORS Michael Kors Lela Two Tone Boots | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements FIT: True to US sizing. Size & Fit Circumference: 16in / 41cm Shaft: 16in / 41cm Heel: 3.5in / 90mm MEASUREMENTS This item cannot be gift-boxed. Imported. Leather: Cowhide. Matte suede constructs the shaft of these glazed leather boots, lending a cool mix of textures to a chic pair of cool-weather essentials. The shaft is detailed at the ankle with a buttoned leather strap and raised seams, while a slim crepe sidewall adds a unique finish. Stacked heel and leather sole. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Mention KORS by Michael Kors shoes, and images of polished, sleek, sophisticated creations come to mind. The jet-set, luxurious attitude of Michael Kors's creations have given him a seemingly endless list of celebrity fans and awards. Michael Kors got his start designing and merchandising a collection for Lothar's in New York at the young age of 19. He struck out on his own in 1981, and his line has continued to grow in the exceptional experience of this seasoned professional.
